summary: This is an email chain from February 2021 discussing scheduling a call to discuss the Office of Professional Responsibility's (OPR) final report on the Jeffrey Epstein matter. The report itself was transmitted in November 2020.

events.title: OPR Final Report Transmitted
events.description: The Office of Professional Responsibility's final report on the Jeffrey Epstein matter, along with a transmittal letter, was sent to the recipient(s).

events.title: Scheduling Discussion for OPR Report Call
events.description: Initial email sent proposing a call for early the following week to discuss the OPR Epstein final report.

events.title: Rescheduling of OPR Report Call
events.description: A childcare issue caused a request to reschedule the call about the OPR report to the afternoon, specifically the 1-2 PM window.

events.title: Confirmation of Call Time
events.description: Confirmation email agreeing to the 1-2 PM window for the call about the OPR Epstein final report.

keyFacts: The Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) completed a final report on the Jeffrey Epstein matter.
The OPR report was transmitted to the Southern District of New York (SDNY) on November 12, 2020.
In early 2021, individuals were scheduling a call to discuss the contents of this OPR final report.
The document references two attached files: the transmittal letter and the full report with exhibits.
All personal names in the email chain are redacted, indicated by angle brackets (e.g., <name>).
